column3: Mysterious archway looming over your head
A large chandalier lights up the room and high vaulted ceilings seem to become the night sky
I see you've chosen to continue exploring this castle
This is where weary travelers come to restock their stores and the cook comes to grab food
Cook rules supreme… but you may be able to sneak a bite
Beware of illness and black mold
Come here to replenish your weapons and sharpen your sword
